# Introduction to Python {.unnumbered}

Here will be the introduction to `Python`. Now an example of code visualization, this allows to write and execute `R` and `Python` code:

::: {.cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from scipy.stats import norm

x = np.linspace(-3, 3, 1000)
y = norm.pdf(x, loc=0, scale=1)

plt.figure(1)
plt.plot(x, y, label='Densidad Normal Estándar')
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Densidad')
plt.title('Densidad Normal Estándar')
plt.legend()
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
